name: Morit Kharvaach
description:
Controls Keyboard/Mouse
  • A/D --> Move Left/Right
  • Left Shift --> Roll
  • Space --> Jump
  • Maintain Right Mouse Click Pressed --> Aim
  • Left Mouse Click --> Shoot
  • Q --> Whistle
Controls Controller
  • D-Pad or Left Stick --> Move Left/Right
  • Button Est --> Roll
  • Button Sud --> Jump
  • Maintain Left Trigger Pressed --> Aim
  • Right Trigger --> Shoot
  • Button Nord --> Whistle
